titles.title: Congratulating Prime Minister Portia Simpson-Miller for becoming the first democratically-elected female Prime Minister of Jamaica and the first female Jamaican head of state.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Western Hemisphere.

bill.summary: 1/5/2007--Introduced. Congratulates Prime Minister Portia Simpson-Miller for becoming the first democratically-elected female Prime Minister of Jamaica and the first female Jamaican head of state. Commends the people of Jamaica for this benchmark for women, for democracy, and for a diverse and prosperous nation, and encourages further progress by Jamaican women to be successful leaders and policymakers.
